category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_custom_validate_before_send_to_IMDS
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the International Material Data System (IMDS) object data requires custom validation by custom handler before sending to the International Material Data System (IMDS). The default value is "false"
